author: malbouis
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of PR #38951

This is a simple PR to update the alcareco matrix so that it is in line with the [alcareco matrix](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/viewauth/CMS/AlCaRecoMatrix#COLLISIONS_2022) for tier0.

#### PR validation:

`runTheMatrix.py -l 1001.3,1002.3,1002.4`

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport of PR #38951
title: [124X] Update alcareco matrix
